item.title: Chapter 1 : Pirates
item.description: Lesson 1 Trace Ecrite : Pirates fiction vs. reality Vocabulary : Pirates chapter See Memrise Activity : Pirate card game Lesson 2 Document : the Golden Age of Piracy Grammar : the preterit affirmation negation interrogative Lesson 3 Document : Myths and reality about pirates TASK : Debunking myths about pirates Lesson 4 Grammar : Might and May PRESENT PAST SUBJECT + MIGHT + VERB SUBJECT + MIGHT HAVE + PP She might be English She might have gone to England She might speak English She might have learnt English at school She might be speaking She might have been speaking to her friend N.

item.title: Chapter 0 : Summer review
item.description: Lesson 1 Recall what news you remember from the summer Listening with 10 news items from the summer https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pq27q322Anf37GjjwDTPhfg3YNl6LaGl/view?usp=sharing Start preparation for a personal presentation of the news https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1e4fXwvBdbXZNDuMzLjKzQOBuZf0lOqg%5FwRGPhJlkiy8/edit?usp=sharing
